rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {4508, M6022}

description: This unit will explore the history, theory and principles of Developmental Observation and its relevance to clinical and consultative work with children and adolescents.  There will be a consideration of the nature of the links between observation and the developmental theories.  Students will be able to explore these areas both through the context of the course work and prescribed observations of children in their naturalistic settings.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
